list.name: Stench
list.desc: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokemon flinch with each hit.

list.name: Drizzle
list.desc: Summons rain that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

list.name: Speed Boost
list.desc: Raises Speed one stage after each turn.

list.name: Battle Armor
list.desc: Protects against critical hits.

list.name: Sturdy
list.desc: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

list.name: Damp
list.desc: Prevents , , and  from working while the Pokemon is in battle.

list.name: Limber
list.desc: Prevents paralysis.

list.name: Sand Veil
list.desc: Increases evasion to 1.25% during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

list.name: Static
list.desc: Has a 30% chance of paralyzing attacking Pokemon on contact.

list.name: Volt Absorb
list.desc: Absorbs electric moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

list.name: Water Absorb
list.desc: Absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

list.name: Oblivious
list.desc: Prevents infatuation and protects against .

list.name: Cloud Nine
list.desc: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.

list.name: Compound Eyes
list.desc: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.3%.

list.name: Insomnia
list.desc: Prevents sleep.

list.name: Color Change
list.desc: Changes type to match when hit by a damaging move.

list.name: Immunity
list.desc: Prevents poison.

list.name: Flash Fire
list.desc: Protects against fire moves.  Once one has been blocked, the Pokemon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5% damage until it leaves battle.

list.name: Shield Dust
list.desc: Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.

list.name: Own Tempo
list.desc: Prevents confusion.

list.name: Suction Cups
list.desc: Prevents being forced out of battle by other Pokemon's moves.

list.name: Intimidate
list.desc: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

list.name: Shadow Tag
list.desc: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.

list.name: Rough Skin
list.desc: Damages attacking Pokemon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

list.name: Wonder Guard
list.desc: Protects against damaging moves that are not super effective.

list.name: Levitate
list.desc: Evades ground moves.

list.name: Effect Spore
list.desc: Has a 30% chance of inflcting either paralysis, poison, or sleep on attacking Pokemon on contact.

list.name: Synchronize
list.desc: Copies burns, paralysis, and poison received onto the Pokemon that inflicted them.

list.name: Clear Body
list.desc: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokemon.

list.name: Natural Cure
list.desc: Cures any major status ailment upon switching out.

list.name: Lightning Rod
list.desc: Redirects single-target electric moves to this Pokemon where possible.  Absorbs Electric moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

list.name: Serene Grace
list.desc: Doubles the chance of moves' extra effects occurring.

list.name: Swift Swim
list.desc: Doubles Speed during rain.

list.name: Chlorophyll
list.desc: Doubles Speed during strong sunlight.

list.name: Illuminate
list.desc: Doubles the wild encounter rate.

list.name: Trace
list.desc: Copies an opponent's ability upon entering battle.

list.name: Huge Power
list.desc: Doubles Attack in battle.

list.name: Poison Point
list.desc: Has a 30% chance of poisoning attacking Pokemon on contact.

list.name: Inner Focus
list.desc: Prevents flinching.

list.name: Magma Armor
list.desc: Prevents freezing.

list.name: Water Veil
list.desc: Prevents burns.

list.name: Magnet Pull
list.desc: Prevents steel opponents from fleeing or switching out.

list.name: Soundproof
list.desc: Protects against sound-based moves.

list.name: Rain Dish
list.desc: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during rain.

list.name: Sand Stream
list.desc: Summons a sandstorm that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

list.name: Pressure
list.desc: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokemon by one.

list.name: Thick Fat
list.desc: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.

list.name: Early Bird
list.desc: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.

list.name: Flame Body
list.desc: Has a 30% chance of burning attacking Pokemon on contact.

list.name: Run Away
list.desc: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.

list.name: Keen Eye
list.desc: Prevents accuracy from being lowered.

list.name: Hyper Cutter
list.desc: Prevents Attack from being lowered by other Pokemon.

list.name: Pickup
list.desc: Picks up other Pokemon's used and Flung held items.  May also pick up an item after battle.

list.name: Truant
list.desc: Skips every second turn.

list.name: Hustle
list.desc: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5% damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8%.

list.name: Cute Charm
list.desc: Has a 30% chance of infatuating attacking Pokemon on contact.

list.name: Plus
list.desc: Increases Special Attack to 1.5% when a friendly Pokemon has  or .

list.name: Minus
list.desc: Increases Special Attack to 1.5% when a friendly Pokemon has  or .

list.name: Forecast
list.desc: Changes 's type and form to match the weather.

list.name: Sticky Hold
list.desc: Prevents a held item from being removed by other Pokemon.

list.name: Shed Skin
list.desc: Has a 33% chance of curing any major status ailment after each turn.

list.name: Guts
list.desc: Increases Attack to 1.5% with a major status ailment.

list.name: Marvel Scale
list.desc: Increases Defense to 1.5% with a major status ailment.

list.name: Liquid Ooze
list.desc: Damages opponents using leeching moves for as much as they would heal.

list.name: Overgrow
list.desc: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5% damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

list.name: Blaze
list.desc: Strengthens fire moves to inflict 1.5% damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

list.name: Torrent
list.desc: Strengthens water moves to inflict 1.5% damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

list.name: Swarm
list.desc: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5% damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

list.name: Rock Head
list.desc: Protects against recoil damage.

list.name: Drought
list.desc: Summons strong sunlight that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

list.name: Arena Trap
list.desc: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.  Eluded by flying-types and Pokemon in the air.

list.name: Vital Spirit
list.desc: Prevents sleep.

list.desc: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokemon.

list.name: Pure Power
list.desc: Doubles Attack in battle.

list.name: Shell Armor
list.desc: Protects against critical hits.

list.desc: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.

list.name: Tangled Feet
list.desc: Doubles evasion when confused.

list.name: Motor Drive
list.desc: Absorbs electric moves, raising Speed one stage.

list.name: Rivalry
list.desc: Increases damage inflicted to 1.25% against Pokemon of the same gender, but decreases damage to 0.75% against the opposite gender.

list.name: Steadfast
list.desc: Raises Speed one stage upon flinching.

list.name: Snow Cloak
list.desc: Increases evasion to 1.25% during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

list.name: Gluttony
list.desc: Makes the Pokemon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

list.name: Anger Point
list.desc: Raises Attack to the maximum of six stages upon receiving a critical hit.

list.name: Unburden
list.desc: Doubles Speed upon using or losing a held item.

list.name: Heatproof
list.desc: Halves damage from fire moves and burns.

list.name: Simple
list.desc: Doubles the Pokemon's stat modifiers.  These doubled modifiers are still capped at -6 or 6 stages.

list.name: Dry Skin
list.desc: Causes 1/8 max HP in damage each turn during strong sunlight, but heals for 1/8 max HP during rain.  Increases damage from fire moves to 1.25%, but absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

list.name: Download
list.desc: Raises the attack stat corresponding to the opponents' weaker defense one stage upon entering battle.

list.name: Iron Fist
list.desc: Strengthens punch-based moves to 1.2% their power.

list.name: Poison Heal
list.desc: Heals for 1/8 max HP after each turn when poisoned in place of damage.

list.name: Adaptability
list.desc: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5% to 2%.

list.name: Skill Link
list.desc: Extends two-to-five-hit moves and  to their full length every time.

list.name: Hydration
list.desc: Cures any major status ailment after each turn during rain.

list.name: Solar Power
list.desc: Increases Special Attack to 1.5% but costs 1/8 max HP after each turn during strong sunlight.

list.name: Quick Feet
list.desc: Increases Speed to 1.5% with a major status ailment.

list.name: Normalize
list.desc: Makes the Pokemon's moves all act normal-type.

list.name: Sniper
list.desc: Strengthens critical hits to inflict 3% damage rather than 2%.

list.name: Magic Guard
list.desc: Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.

list.name: No Guard
list.desc: Ensures all moves used by and against the Pokemon hit.

list.name: Stall
list.desc: Makes the Pokemon move last within its move's priority bracket.

list.name: Technician
list.desc: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5% their power.

list.name: Leaf Guard
list.desc: Protects against major status ailments during strong sunlight.

list.name: Klutz
list.desc: Prevents the Pokemon from using its held item in battle.

list.name: Mold Breaker
list.desc: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent a move.

list.name: Super Luck
list.desc: Raises moves' critical hit rates one stage.

list.name: Aftermath
list.desc: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.

list.name: Anticipation
list.desc: Notifies all trainers upon entering battle if an opponent has a super-effective move, , , or a one-hit KO move.

list.name: Forewarn
list.desc: Reveals the opponents' strongest move upon entering battle.

list.name: Unaware
list.desc: Ignores other Pokemon's stat modifiers for damage and accuracy calculation.

list.name: Tinted Lens
list.desc: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.

list.name: Filter
list.desc: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.

list.name: Slow Start
list.desc: Halves Attack and Speed for five turns upon entering battle.

list.name: Scrappy
list.desc: Lets the Pokemon's normal and fighting moves hit ghost Pokemon.

list.name: Storm Drain
list.desc: Redirects single-target water moves to this Pokemon where possible.  Absorbs Water moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

list.name: Ice Body
list.desc: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

list.name: Solid Rock
list.desc: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.

list.name: Snow Warning
list.desc: Summons hail that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

list.desc: The Pokemon may pick up  after battle.

list.name: Frisk
list.desc: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.

list.name: Reckless
list.desc: Strengthens recoil moves to 1.2% their power.

list.name: Multitype
list.desc: Changes 's type and form to match its held Plate.

list.desc: Increases friendly Pokemon's Attack and Special Defense to 1.5% during strong sunlight.

list.name: Bad Dreams
list.desc: Damages sleeping opponents for 1/8 their max HP after each turn.

list.name: Pickpocket
list.desc: Steals attacking Pokemon's held items on contact.

list.name: Sheer Force
list.desc: Strengthens moves with extra effects to 1.3% their power, but prevents their extra effects.

list.name: Contrary
list.desc: Inverts stat changes.

list.name: Unnerve
list.desc: Prevents opposing Pokemon from eating held Berries.

list.name: Defiant
list.desc: Raises Attack two stages upon having any stat lowered.

list.name: Defeatist
list.desc: Halves Attack and Special Attack at 50% max HP or less.

list.name: Cursed Body
list.desc: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokemon.

list.name: Healer
list.desc: Has a 30% chance of curing each adjacent ally of any major status ailment after each turn.

list.name: Friend Guard
list.desc: Decreases all direct damage taken by friendly Pokemon to 0.75%.

list.name: Weak Armor
list.desc: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.

list.name: Heavy Metal
list.desc: Doubles the Pokemon's weight.

list.name: Light Metal
list.desc: Halves the Pokemon's weight.

list.name: Multiscale
list.desc: Halves damage taken from full HP.

list.name: Toxic Boost
list.desc: Increases Attack to 1.5% when poisoned.

list.name: Flare Boost
list.desc: Increases Special Attack to 1.5% when burned.

list.name: Harvest
list.desc: Has a 50% chance of restoring a used Berry after each turn if the Pokemon has held no items in the meantime.

list.name: Telepathy
list.desc: Protects against friendly Pokemon's damaging moves.

list.name: Moody
list.desc: Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn.

list.name: Overcoat
list.desc: Protects against damage from weather.

list.name: Poison Touch
list.desc: Has a 30% chance of poisoning target Pokemon upon contact.

list.name: Regenerator
list.desc: Heals for 1/3 max HP upon switching out.

list.name: Big Pecks
list.desc: Protects against Defense drops.

list.name: Sand Rush
list.desc: Doubles Speed during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

list.name: Wonder Skin
list.desc: Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base accuracy to exactly 50%.

list.name: Analytic
list.desc: Strengthens moves to 1.3% their power when moving last.

list.name: Illusion
list.desc: Takes the appearance of the last conscious party Pokemon upon being sent out until hit by a damaging move.

list.name: Imposter
list.desc: Transforms upon entering battle.

list.name: Infiltrator
list.desc: Bypasses , , and .

list.name: Mummy
list.desc: Changes attacking Pokemon's abilities to Mummy on contact.

list.name: Moxie
list.desc: Raises Attack one stage upon KOing a Pokemon.

list.name: Justified
list.desc: Raises Attack one stage upon taking damage from a dark move.

list.name: Rattled
list.desc: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a dark, ghost, or bug move.

list.name: Magic Bounce
list.desc: Reflects most non-damaging moves back at their user.

list.name: Sap Sipper
list.desc: Absorbs grass moves, raising Attack one stage.

list.name: Prankster
list.desc: Raises non-damaging moves' priority by one stage.

list.name: Sand Force
list.desc: Strengthens rock, ground, and steel moves to 1.3% their power during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

list.name: Iron Barbs
list.desc: Damages attacking Pokemon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

list.name: Zen Mode
list.desc: Changes 's form after each turn depending on its HP: Zen Mode below 50% max HP, and Standard Mode otherwise.

list.name: Victory Star
list.desc: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.1% for friendly Pokemon.

list.name: Turboblaze
list.desc: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent moves.

list.name: Teravolt
list.desc: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent moves.

list.name: Aroma Veil
list.desc: Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.

list.name: Flower Veil
list.desc: Protects friendly grass Pokemon from having their stats lowered by other Pokemon.

list.name: Cheek Pouch
list.desc: Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.

list.name: Protean
list.desc: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.

list.name: Fur Coat
list.desc: Halves damage from physical attacks.

list.name: Magician
list.desc: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.

list.name: Bulletproof
list.desc: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.

list.name: Competitive
list.desc: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.

list.name: Strong Jaw
list.desc: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5% their power.

list.name: Refrigerate
list.desc: Turns the bearer's normal moves into ice moves and strengthens them to 1.3% their power.

list.name: Sweet Veil
list.desc: Prevents friendly Pokemon from sleeping.

list.name: Stance Change
list.desc: Changes  to Blade Forme before using a damaging move, or Shield Forme before using .

list.name: Gale Wings
list.desc: Raises flying moves' priority by one stage.

list.name: Mega Launcher
list.desc: Strengthens aura and pulse moves to 1.5% their power.

list.name: Grass Pelt
list.desc: Boosts Defense while  is in effect.

list.name: Symbiosis
list.desc: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.

list.name: Tough Claws
list.desc: Strengthens moves that make contact to 1.33% their power.

list.name: Pixilate
list.desc: Turns the bearer's normal moves into fairy moves and strengthens them to 1.3% their power.

list.name: Gooey
list.desc: Lowers attacking Pokemon's Speed by one stage on contact.

list.name: Aerilate
list.desc: Turns the bearer's normal moves into flying moves and strengthens them to 1.3% their power.

list.name: Parental Bond
list.desc: Lets the bearer hit twice with damaging moves.  The second hit has half power.

list.name: Dark Aura
list.desc: Strengthens dark moves to 1.33% their power for all friendly and opposing Pokemon.

list.name: Fairy Aura
list.desc: Strengthens fairy moves to 1.33% their power for all friendly and opposing Pokemon.

list.name: Aura Break
list.desc: Makes  and  weaken moves of their respective types.

list.name: Primordial Sea
list.desc: Creates heavy rain, which has all the properties of Rain Dance, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Fire moves to fail.

list.name: Desolate Land
list.desc: Creates extremely harsh sunlight, which has all the properties of Sunny Day, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Water moves to fail.

list.name: Delta Stream
list.desc: Creates a mysterious air current, which cannot be replaced and causes moves to never be super effective against Flying Pokemon.

list.name: Stamina
list.desc: Raises this Pokemon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.

list.name: Wimp Out
list.desc: This Pokemon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.

list.name: Emergency Exit
list.desc: This Pokemon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.

list.name: Water Compaction
list.desc: Raises this Pokemon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.

list.name: Merciless
list.desc: This Pokemon's moves critical hit against poisoned targets.

list.name: Shields Down
list.desc: Transforms this Minior between Core Form and Meteor Form.  Prevents major status ailments and drowsiness while in Meteor Form.

list.name: Stakeout
list.desc: This Pokemon's moves have double power against Pokemon that switched in this turn.

list.name: Water Bubble
list.desc: Halves damage from Fire moves, doubles damage of Water moves, and prevents burns.

list.name: Steelworker
list.desc: This Pokemon's Steel moves have 1.5% power.

list.name: Berserk
list.desc: Raises this Pokemon's Special Attack by one stage every time its HP drops below half.

list.name: Slush Rush
list.desc: During Hail, this Pokemon has double Speed.

list.name: Long Reach
list.desc: This Pokemon's moves do not make contact.

list.name: Liquid Voice
list.desc: Sound-based moves become Water-type.

list.name: Triage
list.desc: This Pokemon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.

list.name: Galvanize
list.desc: This Pokemon's Normal moves are Electric and have their power increased to 1.2%.

list.name: Surge Surfer
list.desc: Doubles this Pokemon's Speed on Electric Terrain.

list.name: Schooling
list.desc: Wishiwashi becomes Schooling Form when its HP is 25% or higher.

list.name: Disguise
list.desc: Prevents the first instance of battle damage.

list.name: Battle Bond
list.desc: Transforms this Pokemon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent.  Water Shuriken's power is 20 and always hits three times.

list.name: Power Construct
list.desc: Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%.

list.name: Corrosion
list.desc: This Pokemon can inflict poison on Poison and Steel Pokemon.

list.name: Comatose
list.desc: This Pokemon always  acts as though it were Asleep.

list.name: Queenly Majesty
list.desc: Opposing Pokemon cannot use priority attacks.

list.name: Innards Out
list.desc: When this Pokemon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokemon had remaining.

list.name: Dancer
list.desc: Whenever another Pokemon uses a dance move, this Pokemon will use the same move immediately afterwards.

list.name: Battery
list.desc: Ally Pokemon's moves have their power increased to 1.3%.

list.name: Fluffy
list.desc: Damage from contact moves is halved.  Damage from Fire moves is doubled.

list.name: Dazzling
list.desc: Opposing Pokemon cannot use priority attacks.

list.name: Soul-Heart
list.desc: This Pokemon's Special Attack rises by one stage every time any Pokemon faints.

list.name: Tangling Hair
list.desc: When this Pokemon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokemon's Speed lowers by one stage.

list.name: Receiver
list.desc: When an ally faints, this Pokemon gains its Ability.

list.name: Power of Alchemy
list.desc: When an ally faints, this Pokemon gains its Ability.

list.name: Beast Boost
list.desc: Raises this Pokemon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokemon.

list.name: RKS System
list.desc: Changes this Pokemon's type to match its held Memory.

list.name: Electric Surge
list.desc: When this Pokemon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Electric Terrain.

list.name: Psychic Surge
list.desc: When this Pokemon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain.

list.name: Misty Surge
list.desc: When this Pokemon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Misty Terrain.

list.name: Grassy Surge
list.desc: When this Pokemon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Grassy Terrain.

list.name: Full Metal Body
list.desc: Other Pokemon cannot lower this Pokemon's stats.

list.name: Shadow Shield
list.desc: When this Pokemon has full HP, regular damage from moves is halved.

list.name: Prism Armor
list.desc: Reduces super-effective damage to 0.75%.

list.name: Neuroforce
list.desc: Increases super-effective damage dealt to 1.25%.
